title: Diabetes-related amputations; direct Dept. of Health to appoint Research 1 MS university to conduct study on prevention and reduction of.
subject: Public Health and Welfare

actions.description: Referred To Public Health and Welfare
Title Suff Do Pass Comm Sub

extras.summary: AN ACT TO DIRECT THE STATE DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH TO APPOINT A MISSISSIPPI UNIVERSITY LISTED AS RESEARCH 1 (R1) IN THE CARNEGIE CLASSIFICATION OF INSTITUTIONS OF HIGHER EDUCATION TO CONDUCT A STUDY ON THE PREVENTION AND REDUCTION OF AMPUTATIONS RESULTING FROM DIABETES AND RELATED COMPLICATIONS; TO SET FORTH TOPICS FOR EVALUATION BY THE STUDY; TO ESTABLISH THE MEMBERSHIP OF THE STUDY COMMITTEE AND PROVIDE THAT THE STUDY COMMITTEE SHALL BE GOVERNED BY THE R1 UNIVERSITY; TO REQUIRE THE STUDY COMMITTEE TO FILE A REPORT WITH THE LEGISLATURE NOT LATER THAN DECEMBER 1, 2026; AND FOR RELATED PURPOSES.
